column4: i think bluetooth support(as in driver) belongs to the kernel stuff. you might want to check if it's in 2.6.17 on kernel newbies
Do I manually check synaptic for updates
memticvirus: they were saying something about large portions of the code being 32bit specific. but if that's true their devs truely need dist-upgrade for their minds
nope, why should you? the update manager takes care of it, and if you like CLI do this: apt-get update; apt-get upgrade
